name: Sovereign Carrier
description: This carrier is not like other carriers, it has the ability to have multiple beam weapons that can deal a good amount of damage, and can be used for farming if piloted correctly. So basically it goes \"IMMA FIRING MA LAZERRR\" then other ship dies slowly and painfully.
obtaining: In order to get this ship, you can either gain it through events, such as Altairian Strike, or from attacking the Mothership cargo fleets.
tips-builds: Basically just keep on adding cyclotron beams to your sov, but you also want some armor and some thrusters as well.
author: The one that goes by the name of jammer of the Ghost
